When sentiments not good  you can see how fast pennies can drop.Up fast can down fast.That‚Äôs why  SL really important.Asian Micro is one good example.Less than 2 weeks backs $0.024 high then now $0.014.My average EP about $0.0215 cut $0.021 and $0.020.Sentiments change have to react fast. If didn‚Äôt cut then the $2.5k loss would have been $15k loss instead.Most pennies for trading and not for investment. Want to invest have to study the FA and best to look for those that are consistently paying dividends.We learn and get better as we gain experience. Ultimately  in a bad market  surviving is priority.
